Hello St. Johns! Come by for a tarot reading and check out some records!! With @sirbrantheblessed and DJ Mountain Cloud!

We’re excited to announce that we are hosting social Distance Saturday Tarot Readings with Sir Bran The Blessed! Starting July 4th  12-4:30 for scheduling or pricing call us or drop by!  Here’s their Bio...
Sir bran the blessed is a native North Portlander and hereditary enchantx, witch and conjurer who grew up practicing old school Hoodoo, New Orleans Voodoo, European Witchcraft and Curanderismo. Sir Bran’s personal approach is “one should know the rules and then transcend them through rigorous study, humor, practice, commitment to diversity and innovation.” They apply this to their personal practice, their classes, Their Tarot readings and their extensive magickal work within the Portland area. Sir Bran is one of the preeminent tarot and heritage card readers in the Portland area. They are also the author of the upcoming book “The Black, Brown and Queer Intersectional Magical survival guide” through Microcosm Publishing, illustator. of " The Holy Othered" tarot deck and Queen of the ZephyrHaus coven in Portland, Oregon. They also like pizza rolls, Maya Angelou and Dior. You can follow them on Instagram @Sirbrantheblessed  #tarot #local #witch #artist #queen #microcosmpublishing #stjohnspdx #love #pride #portlandoregon #localbookstore #witchcraft #godsandgoddesses #brownisbeautiful #queer

View from my backyard:

Roosevelt Rider 
graduation pride
Ensnared by quotidian wires;

Damn this modern life 
That robs our youth
Of revelry that marks flight
Into new, broader skies of adulthood!

But let's not lose hope just yet
For those wires are filled with cunning 
Lightning, charging those
Balloons for greater flight--
just look 
how they dance & tussle in the wind,
Ready to break loose!

Just like our youth!

#rooseveltrider #riderpride #graduationpoem #makingitupasigo #poem #originalpoem #roosevelthighschool #kidsareourfuture #classof2020
#stjohnspride
